name: Monster Casino
description:
Welcome to the Monster Casino!

Try to rake in as many chips as you can in one of our famous Monster Slot Machines! 

Start with 100 chips and a random selection of moves. 

Fight monsters each round. defeat them to get more chips, die and you'll lose all your progress.

After each round you'll be given the choice to cash out, we'll mark your chips as your high score, but if you're feeling lucky then you can keep going for a higher score!

 Good Luck!
